EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact and Re Enrollment (1337118635.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact and Re Enrollment (1337118635.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Maziar, I see the enrollment updated, thank you for completing it. I looked at the I-9 form and since it is the same form version number we are actually ok. Sorry for the confusion on my part. I will work on getting your account set up and you will receive a notification form our system when this is completed. Thanks!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> maziar salehi [mailto:maziar_s@yahoo.com] Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 8:28 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Point of Contact and Re Enrollment Hello, I enrolled online last Friday night. Is it not showing that? Oh I see, I was told my notarized I9 from last April would be OK, is that not the case, can I send you the same notarized document? Thank you, Maziar Salehi From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "maziar_s@yahoo.com" <maziar_s@yahoo.com <mailto:maziar_s@yahoo.com>> Cc: Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>> Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 2:16 PM Subject: RE: MBO Partners Point of Contact and Re Enrollment Hi Maziar, Hope had a nice weekend, just wanted to follow up on your re-enrollment with MBO. Please see instruction list below and let me know if you have any questions. Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBDvEZk1O%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 5:28 PM To: 'maziar_s@yahoo.com' Cc: Steve Arhancet (sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>) Subject: MBO Partners Point of Contact and Re Enrollment Importance: High Dear Maziar, Welcome back to MBO! My name is Sara Conde and I will be your point of contact to finish up your enrollemnt. Steve Arhancet (copied above) caught me up to speed and I am looking forward to workign with you and providing you with a great MBO experience. Please follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBDvEZk1O%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the Enrollment link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBDvEZk1O%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xU%0d%0aAKZjCdlBDvEZk1O%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. </htm
